newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn cattle market up $1 at $70 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn cattle market up $1 at $70 - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were mostly $1.00 per cwt higher, compared with Tuesday's close, USDA said. Trade moderate to active. Demand good. Seller interest moderate to good. Offerings fairly light.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lbs 69.00-70.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1075-1200 lbs 69.00-70.00.
On a carcass basis (weight only), compared with Tuesday's close, slaughter steers and heifers were $1.00 higher.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lbs 109.00-110.00 Mixed Select and Choice 2-4 1350 lbs ld uneven 108.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 101.00-102.00. Holstein - (grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 1250-1400 lbs 103.00 Select 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 1250-1400 lbs 98.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1050-1200 lbs 109.00-110.00.
Wk to Date - 6,900 Week Ago - 17,700 Year Ago - 59,300
